results.content:
There were a couple of tricks here which was totally new to me, which is awesome. This course does indeed cover most of pug, so if you are starting out, its perfect. Its also something which can be covered quickly giving you the ability to start doing stuff to learn.

I would like to see some of the more difficult things to handle in pug covered as well. Somewhat more complex examples like looping through json/array objects, using js functions on variables or ${}.

All in all its worth while your time, and if you are new to pug quite essential if you are not a read-docs person but love to see demos and examples as a substitute.
